this_title: Diana Krall: Live at the Montreal Jazz Festival
trans_title: 黛安娜·克劳：蒙特利尔爵士音乐节现场
introduction: Diana Krall 在2004年6月29日，加拿大的蒙特利尔爵士音乐节上的现场录音。现场表演了歌曲有：Sometimes I just Freak OutAll or nothing at allStop This WorldThe Girl in the Other RoomAbandoned MasqueradeI'm Coming ThroughTemptationEast of the SunDevil May CareBlack CrowNarrow DaylightLove Me Like a ManDeparture Baywww.Montrealjazzfest.com
chinese_title: 黛安娜·克劳：蒙特利尔爵士音乐节现场
foreign_title: Diana Krall: Live at the Montreal Jazz Festival
